text: Mikhail Mikhajlovich DerzhavinПрофиль, KinoPoisk.ru; accessed 12 January 2018.(; 15 June 1936 – 10 January 2018) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was born in Moscow. He was known for his roles in They Were the First (1956), Three Men in a Boat (1979), Investigation Held by ZnaToKi (1980), Winter Evening in Gagra (1985) and in Old Hags (2000) as Secretary of the Communist ideology. Derzhavin died of a long-illness in Moscow on 10 January 2018 at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow
